techmeme.title: Microsoft plans to invest $3.21B to expand its cloud and AI infrastructure in Sweden over two years, including a pledge to train 250K people with AI skills (Reuters)
Spotify plans to raise US prices: Premium from $10.99 to $11.99 per month, Duo from $14.99 to $16.99, and Family from $16.99 to $19.99, after a July 2023 hike (Tom Warren/The Verge)
Raspberry Pi plans to sell shares at £2.60 to £2.80 each in its London IPO, aiming to raise ~£157M; existing shareholder Arm has agreed to buy $35M of shares (Swetha Gopinath/Bloomberg)
FTX sells its remaining 15M Anthropic shares, netting $450M+ and taking its total haul to $1.3B from its original $500M investment, as legal costs pass $500M (Zack Abrams/The Block)
Zara plans to expand live shopping broadcasts in the UK, Europe, and the US between August and October 2024, testing a format that is wildly popular in China (Reuters)
